info.label: Senior Engineer Specialising in DevOps and building scalable platforms
info.brief: **Full-stack software engineer with 10 years industry experience** specializing in DevOps and building scalable platforms on premises and cloud. Born and raised in Sydney. Full time Foster Carer.

employment.summary: 10 years in the industry IT specialising software development/engineering and DevOps.

history.position: Senior DevOps Engineer / Senior Platform Engineer
history.summary: My DevOps journey started with implementing CI/CD practices for NetBank for Dev and Testing environments. I then transitioned into a new team who managed all CI/CD tooling and slowly enabled our deveopment teams to implement their own build pipelines with improved productivity and self service capabilities. I was then moved into the Staging and Production deployment team where I work closely with Ops teams and help deploy parts of NetBank into AWS. Once that pattern hit maturity I moved into a full DevOps team which was implementing their own PAAS on Physical Infrastructure using Mesos and Docker.
highlights: Built a PAAS which runs on over 600 servers
Codified Bare Metal deployments
Increased productivity for development teams using CI/CD practices
Enabled teams to self service in various tools
Trained numerous teams in CI/CD

history.summary: Developed .NET Rest APIs to be consumed by CommBanks iOS and Android applications
highlights: Delivered scheduled payments functionality for the CommBank iOS and Android applications

history.summary: Worked on a private video web application like Netflix, which allowed customers to upload videos which then transcoded and distributed the content to their customers. ABC Kids
highlights: Implemented distributed computing with scale out strategies
Implemented CI/CD for test and production deployments
